name: Thunder Shot
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.
This weapon has 4 charges and regains {@dice 1d4|1d4|charges} after a long rest.

{@bold Thunder Shot} While performing an attack with this weapon you may spend one charge to infuse your bullet with lightning. If the attack hits, add an additional {@damage 1d8|1d8|lightning} lightning damage.

{@bold Lightning Conductor} When you take lightning damage you may spend a reaction to refill one or more empty charges. For each charge you refill, you may negate 8 lightning damage (until you cannot negate any more lightning damage).
